    Player API

    resumePlayer()

    The τ Player API

    resumePlayer()

    • Dart API: resumePlayer().

    Use this verbe to resume the current playback. An exception is thrown if the player is not in the “paused” state.

    Example:

    • Dart
    • Javascript
    await myPlayer.resumePlayer();
